glucose_high: Your glucose level is high. Reduce sugar and consult a doctor.
glucose_prediabetes: You are in the prediabetes range. Maintain diet and monitor sugar levels.
bmi_high: Your BMI suggests overweight. Try daily 30-minute walks and light exercise.
bmi_low: Your BMI is low. Consider a nutrient-rich diet with healthy fats and consult a nutritionist.
has_hypertension: Monitor blood pressure weekly and reduce salt intake.
has_heart_disease: Schedule regular cardiologist visits and avoid saturated fats.
default: Maintain a healthy diet and regular checkups. Great job!
